user.title: Set up Moodo
user.description: Please log in with your Moodo account credentials. If you need to reset your password, visit [moodo.co](https://www.moodo.co) or the Moodo app.

data_description.email: The email address associated with your Moodo account.
data_description.password: The password for your Moodo account.

reauth_confirm.title: Reauthenticate Moodo
reauth_confirm.description: Your Moodo credentials need to be updated. Please enter your current email and password. If you need to reset your password, visit [moodo.co](https://www.moodo.co) or the Moodo app.

error.invalid_auth: Invalid email or password. Please check your Moodo account credentials and try again.
error.cannot_connect: Unable to connect to Moodo servers. Please check your internet connection and try again.
error.unknown: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again or check the logs for details.
